statements: SELECT influencer_name, sentiment_score FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT * FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT influencer_id, engagement_rate FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT COUNT(influencer_id) AS total_influencers FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT influencer_name, comment_text FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, sentiment_score FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, comment_text FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score <= 0 ORDER BY influencer_id ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, sentiment_score, engagement_rate FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis WHERE influencer_name LIKE '%John%' AND sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7;
SELECT * FROM influencer_sentiment_analysis WHERE influencer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, engagement_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT id, name, followers_count FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT id, name, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM comments ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, sentiment_label FROM comments WHERE sentiment_label = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC, engagement_rate ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT c.comment_text, c.sentiment_label, i.name FROM comments c JOIN influencers i ON c.influencer_id = i.id WHERE c.sentiment_label = 'positive' ORDER BY c.created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT i.name, SUM(i.followers_count) AS total_followers FROM influencers i JOIN comments c ON i.id = c.influencer_id GROUP BY i.name ORDER BY total_followers DESC;
SELECT i.name, AVG(c.sentiment_label) AS avg_sentiment FROM influencers i JOIN comments c ON i.id = c.influencer_id GROUP BY i.name HAVING COUNT(c.comment_id) > 5 ORDER BY avg_sentiment DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_comments;
SELECT influencer_id, comment_text FROM influencer_comments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, likes_count, comments_count, shares_count FROM influencer_engagement WHERE engagement_rate > 0.1;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, bio_text, industry_category FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 100000;
SELECT * FROM influencer_comments;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count, industry_category FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 100000;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(likes_count) AS total_likes, SUM(shares_count) AS total_shares FROM influencer_engagement GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM influencer_comments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, AVG(follower_count) AS avg_follower_count FROM influencer_profiles GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING avg_follower_count > 50000;
SELECT * FROM influencer_comments;
SELECT influencer_id, comment_text, created_at FROM influencer_comments ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_label, confidence_level FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE analysis_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM influencer_engagement GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM influencer_comments WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT comment_text, sentiment_score FROM influencer_comments ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, joined_date FROM influencer_profiles WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT i.influencer_name, e.likes, e.comments_count, e.shares FROM influencer_profiles i JOIN influencer_engagement e ON i.influencer_id = e.influencer_id ORDER BY e.engagement_date DESC;
SELECT s.sentiment_label, s.confidence_level, c.comment_text FROM sentiment_analysis_results s JOIN influencer_comments c ON s.comment_id = c.comment_id WHERE s.confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_category = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_category FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_id = 3;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM Comments WHERE influencer_id = 2 ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT likes, shares, comments FROM EngagementMetrics WHERE influencer_id = 5;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers JOIN AudienceMetrics ON Influencers.influencer_id = AudienceMetrics.influencer_id;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_category FROM Influencers ORDER BY influencer_category DESC, influencer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_category = 'Fashion' AND influencer_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY influencer_name;
SELECT influencer_name, likes, shares, comments FROM Influencers INNER JOIN EngagementMetrics ON Influencers.influencer_id = EngagementMetrics.influencer_id ORDER BY shares DESC, likes ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT Comments.comment_text, SentimentAnalysis.positive_sentiment FROM Comments INNER JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON Comments.comment_id = SentimentAnalysis.comment_id WHERE SentimentAnalysis.negative_sentiment = FALSE;

SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers INNER JOIN AudienceMetrics ON Influencers.influencer_id = AudienceMetrics.influencer_id ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC, followers_count ASC LIMIT 5;
